Providence Village, TX | Official Website


 






 



This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled "Explore your accessibility options".

1. News & Highlight
   ================

   Keep informed with us

1. [![sign-in website2](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1309)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=69)

   #### [Website Personalization Now Available!](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=69)

   With the launch of the new MyAccount feature, visitors to our website can now customize their viewing experience! [Read on... about Website Personalization Now Available!](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=69)
2. [![Sign up for notifications](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1319)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=68)

   #### [Notify Me!](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=68)

   Subscribe to Notify Me to receive updates and information about community news and happenings. [Read on... about Notify Me!](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=68)
3. [![Waste Water Wanda - Fishtrap & Brewer Rd Closures Jan. 2026](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1300)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=65)

   #### [Fishtrap Rd & Brewer Rd Closures - January 2026](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=65)

   Meet Waste Water Wanda: Providence Village’s hardest-working beaver!
   Wanda (with help from Pavement Pete) will be busy starting this Jan. tackling an important wastewater improvement project that will impact traffic in the area for 3-6 months. [Read on... about Fishtrap Rd & Brewer Rd Closures - January 2026](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=65)
4. [![sign-in website](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1308)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=64)

   #### [Create an Account](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=64)

   With the MyAccount feature, you can customize your viewing experience, sign up for notifications, and engage in information you care about. [Read On about Create an Account](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=64)
5. [![Town Hall LATE OPENING 1.29](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1322)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=60)

   #### [Town Hall Modified Hours](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=60)

   ?? Town Hall Opening Late - Thursday, January 29th, 2026 ?? [Read On about Town Hall Modified Hours](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=60)
6. [![Trash Update (1)](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1318)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=61)

   #### [Trash Service Winter Weather Update](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=61)

   Due to the ongoing winter weather event, Republic Services will NOT be running trash collection on Monday, January 26. [Read On about Trash Service Winter Weather Update](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=61)
7. [![sign-in website2](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1309)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=69)

   #### [Website Personalization Now Available!](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=69)

   With the launch of the new MyAccount feature, visitors to our website can now customize their viewing experience! [Read on... about Website Personalization Now Available!](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=69)
8. [![Sign up for notifications](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1319)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=68)

   #### [Notify Me!](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=68)

   Subscribe to Notify Me to receive updates and information about community news and happenings. [Read on... about Notify Me!](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=68)
9. [![Waste Water Wanda - Fishtrap & Brewer Rd Closures Jan. 2026](https://pvtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1300)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=65)

   #### [Fishtrap Rd & Brewer Rd Closures - January 2026](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=65)

   Meet Waste Water Wanda: Providence Village’s hardest-working beaver!
   Wanda (with help from Pavement Pete) will be busy starting this Jan. tackling an important wastewater improvement project that will impact traffic in the area for 3-6 months. [Read on... about Fishtrap Rd & Brewer Rd Closures - January 2026](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=65)
10. [![sign-in website](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=64)

    #### [Create an Account](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=64)

    With the MyAccount feature, you can customize your viewing experience, sign up for notifications, and engage in information you care about. [Read On about Create an Account](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=64)

12. [![Trash Update (1)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=61)

    #### [Trash Service Winter Weather Update](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=61)

    Due to the ongoing winter weather event, Republic Services will NOT be running trash collection on Monday, January 26. [Read On about Trash Service Winter Weather Update](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=61)
13. [![sign-in website2](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://pvtx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=69)
